item.title: BM Technologies Inc 10-K
item.description: BM Technologies Inc, which is in the State Commercial Banks [6022] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 10, 2022 had 27502 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 283 instances financial - 271 instances 2021 - 267 instances 31 - 238 instances bank - 234 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
